company_context: Ansible Collaborative Documentation Project documentation Ansible Automation Platform documentation Galaxy Forum Resources How Ansible works Ansible ecosystem Frequently asked questions Events Ansible community training Contact us Ansible Automation Platform Ansible Collaborative A gathering space to build automation skills and success Welcome to the Ansible® Collaborative, a destination for Ansible users, customers, partners, and vendors to learn and share automation content. Join the Ansible forum Looking for the enterprise product? Learn about Red Hat® Ansible Automation Platform. Icon-Red_Hat-Directional-A-Black-RGB What is Ansible? No matter your role, or your automation goals, Ansible can help you connect teams and deliver efficiencies. Ansible is an open source IT automation engine that automates provisioning, configuration management, application deployment, orchestration, and many other IT processes. It is free to use, and the project benefits from the experience and intelligence of its thousands of contributors. Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform combines more than a dozen upstream projects into a unified, security-hardened enterprise platform for mission-critical automation. It builds on the foundation of the open source project to create an end-to-end automation experience for cross-functional teams. How Ansible works Automate Policy as Code for consistency and compliance Ansible’s automated Policy as Code capabilities will help you automate compliance and policy enforcement across the full operational life cycle that now includes AI—from creating automation to managing IT processes at scale. Join the Ansible Policy as Code advocacy group to learn best practices, share your ideas with others, and help to shape this technology as it develops. Customers Partners Learn Ansible skills Documentation Introduction to Ansible Start automating with Ansible Create a playbook Explore Ansible concepts Build an inventory Interactive labs Writing first Ansible playbook Intro to Ansible automation controller Get started with ansible-navigator Get started with ansible-builder Get started with Event-Driven Ansible and Ansible rulebooks Explore Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform learning materials and tools Ready to move from patchwork to platform? You already know the benefits of upstream Ansible tools. But if your organization is ready to take automation to the next level, it's time to consider Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform. It delivers more capabilities-like event-driven automation and generative AI-that reduce manual effort and increase efficiency, as well as enhanced security and end-to-end technical support. Get the details Ansible collections With Ansible Galaxy, you can jump-start your automation with pre-packaged roles and collections. Use this content in Ansible Playbooks to automate your work faster and improve productivity. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their IT operations and improve efficiency. I came across your company while researching Ansible users and thought our solution could be a great fit. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing workflow?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another sales call. What makes you think we need your solution? We're already using Ansible for automation and it's working fine for us.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand you're using Ansible, and that's great. However, our solution complements Ansible by providing advanced data processing capabilities that can help you gain deeper insights into your operations. We've had success with other Ansible users who were looking to take their automation to the next level. I'd love to discuss how DeepData AI can help you achieve your goals.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection) I'm not sure we have the budget for this. We've just invested in Ansible and I'm not convinced we need another tool. Plus, I'm not sure how it would integrate with our existing infrastructure.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns. Integration is a top priority for us, and we've worked with other Ansible users to ensure seamless integration. As for budget, I'd be happy to discuss pricing and ROI with you. We've seen our customers achieve significant cost savings and efficiency gains with our solution. Would you be open to a demo to see how DeepData AI can address your specific pain points?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection) I'm not sure I have the time for a demo. We're in the middle of a critical project and I don't want to distract my team. Plus, I'm not the sole decision-maker on this. I'd need to involve our IT director and possibly others.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your time constraints and the need to involve other stakeholders. However, I believe a demo would be a great way to get everyone on the same page and see the value of DeepData AI firsthand. I'd be happy to schedule a demo at your convenience and provide any necessary materials to support your decision-making process. Can I schedule a demo for next week?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (firm decision) You know what, I appreciate your persistence, but I think we'll have to pass on this for now. We've got too much on our plate and I'm not convinced we need another tool. Maybe check back in 6 months and we can reassess our needs then.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Integration
Feedback: The seller should have more effectively addressed the buyer's integration concerns and provided concrete examples of successful implementations with Ansible users to build credibility and trust. Sentiment: Negative

parsed.feedback: The seller should have more effectively addressed the buyer's integration concerns and provided concrete examples of successful implementations with Ansible users to build credibility and trust. Sentiment: Negative
